Package io.micronaut.http.cookie

Interface Cookies

All Superinterfaces:
ConversionServiceProvider, ConvertibleValues<Cookie>, Iterable<Map.Entry<String,Cookie>>, ValueResolver<CharSequence>
All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface Cookies extends ConvertibleValues<Cookie>
Models the defined Cookie instances in an application.
